title: One-dish meals - recipes for busy weeknights
summary: One-dish chicken recipes can be made with just a little bit of prep work. One of the best ways to cut down on the amount of time it takes to prepare a meal is to purchase ingredients ahead of time and keep them on hand. One great example of this is roasting a whole chicken in the oven. It doesn’t take long to roast a chicken and it’s easy to do thanks to the fact that the chicken has already been portioned out for you.
